snippet: Seawater from a crater at the bottom of Chesapeake Bay offers a rare glimpse of the North Atlantic 100 million to 145 million years ago.
abstract: Study in journal Nature reports that seawater retrieved from crater under Chesapeake Bay is 100 million to 145 million years old, offering rare glimpse of ancient ocean conditions in North Atlantic.
lead_paragraph: Seawater from a crater at the bottom of Chesapeake Bay offers a rare glimpse of the North Atlantic 100 million to 145 million years ago.

headline.main: A Rare Sample of a Much Saltier Time
headline.print_headline: Ancient Oceans: A Rare Sample of a Much Saltier Time
